name: Om (AverageJoe)
description:
Om is a retro-style turn-based RPG with a huge emphasis on co-op gameplay. Work with another player to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, level up and slay a boss in this thirty-minute demo which I created as my Final Year Project for my Computer Gameplay Design and Production degree from Staffordshire University.

The game is very much a prototype at present, but contains the framework required to construct a fully-fledged narrative-driven RPG, and if I get the chance I would love to have the opportunity to develop Om to its full potential.
